metadata.synopsis: Group dialogue that happens when any of the hag survivors spots a player. Happens in hags survivors building, downstairs, where all of the survivros are gathered. Provides narrative explanation to players who are the survivors and what bothers them.Should not be repeatable!
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I- Debug teleport to hag survivors, enter the building anf go to the main room downstairs, the dialogue will be triggered when any of player characters is spotted

61.speaker: Adrielle
61.text: An intruder? These people are under my protection, I'll not let you harm them!
61.context: NodeContext: Surprised, the springs to action - stepping forward, ready to defend the group

86.speaker: Adrielle
86.text: Hearken to my words, wicked creature. Return to the pit of evil from whence you came!

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I found a note in the Blushing Mermaid - it led me here.

3.text: Don't listen - who knows what spells it weaves around us? Quickly, cleric!

58.speaker: Adrielle
58.text: Helm, protector of all, grant me the power to ignite this creature's flesh and burn its bones to ash. Begone, monster - your hag mother holds no power here!
58.context: NodeContext: some kind of hand gesture here like she's conjuring something

22.speaker: Player
22.text: A hag is after you? I can help. I've fought one before.

60.speaker: Adrielle
60.text: Then you speak truth? You've fought a hag before?

56.speaker: Adrielle
56.text: At ease, everyone. We may have found ourselves an ally.

70.speaker: Adrielle
70.text: Forgive the welcome, but we're being hunted by a hag - the vicious Ethel herself. We feared you her minion. She's already hexed one of us - and any of us could be next.
70.context: NodeContext: worried - she and the group are in a tense situation with their back against a wall (metaphorically)

91.speaker: Adrielle
91.text: Forgive the welcome, but we're being hunted by a hag - the vicious Ethel herself. We feared you her minion. She's already hexed one of us - and any of us could be next.
91.context: NodeContext: worried - she and the group are in a tense situation with their back against a wall (metaphorically)

71.speaker: Player
71.text: I'm trying to figure out a way to kill Auntie Ethel - any ideas?
71.context: NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

2.speaker: Adrielle
2.text: Mayrina - our leader - was on to something. Unfortunately, Ethel found out - how, I don't know.
2.context: NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

28.speaker: Adrielle
28.text: She hexed Mayrina in recompense - and everything we've done to try to lift it has been for naught.
28.context: NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

32.speaker: Player
32.text: Mayrina? I know her. I saved her and her child.

7.speaker: Adrielle
7.text: Yes. She's spoken of you many times. I confess it's strange meeting you in the flesh. You look so... normal.

63.speaker: Adrielle
63.text: She's upstairs, but be warned, she's not as you remember her.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Let me have a look at this hex - maybe I can help.
14.context: NodeContext: frustrated with herself that she can't do more

83.speaker: Adrielle
83.text: We've exhausted our spells - I was contemplating salt-throwing and other childish superstitions when you arrived, so I'll not refuse your help.
83.context: NodeContext: frustrated with herself that she can't do more

77.speaker: Adrielle
77.text: She is upstairs - you cannot miss her.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: You've dealt with Ethel? I'm shocked you're alive.
81.context: NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

93.speaker: Adrielle
93.text: Not myself, but our leader Mayrina has.
93.context: NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

57.speaker: Adrielle
57.text: Mayrina showed us how to stand on our own two feet - how to fight back. Then Ethel found us.
57.context: NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

68.speaker: Adrielle
68.text: Forgive the paranoia - we're being hunted by a vile and wicked hag. We feared you her minion. She's already hexed one of us - and any of us could be next.
68.context: NodeContext: worried - she and the group are in a tense situation with their back against a wall (metaphorically)

6.speaker: Player
6.text: If you pissed off a hag, you're screwed.

30.speaker: Adrielle
30.text: Because we dared to do the impossible - we dared to fight back.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: I've fought a hag before. No easy task.
54.context: NodeContext: sincere - always happy to welcome someone who has dealt with a hag

89.speaker: Adrielle
89.text: Really? You should join us, then.
89.context: NodeContext: sincere - always happy to welcome someone who has dealt with a hag

33.speaker: Player
33.text: I've fought enough hags for one lifetime.
33.context: NodeContext: determined - she's picked herself up from rock bottom

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I've fought enough hags for one lifetime.
26.context: NodeContext: determined - she's picked herself up from rock bottom

19.speaker: Adrielle
19.text: Then you see the truth they've kept hidden - that they can be defeated.
19.context: NodeContext: determined - she's picked herself up from rock bottom

13.speaker: Adrielle
13.text: You see, all of us here have fallen victim to a hag's vicious ways. But instead of succumbing to despair, we rose above it.
13.context: NodeContext: determined - she's picked herself up from rock bottom

20.speaker: Adrielle
20.text: Thanks to Mayrina, our leader. Together, we've been helping others who've suffered at the claws of a hag.
20.context: NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

29.speaker: Adrielle
29.text: Only... Mayrina's been hexed by the very hag who now hunts us.
29.context: NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Mayrina? I know her! She was captured by Auntie Ethel.

9.speaker: Adrielle
9.text: You're the one that saved her? The one that ventured to the depths of Ethel's lair? I can hardly believe it - you look so... normal.

17.speaker: Adrielle
17.text: By Helm, perhaps there is hope. If anyone can help Mayrina, it's you. She's upstairs, but be warned, she's not as you remember her.
17.context: NodeContext: hope in the first half, sadness in the second (mayrina has been turned into a sheep)

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Looks like you're in for rough times.
62.context: NodeContext: trying to be determined but is really just sad - she cares about mayrina and is worried for her

43.speaker: Adrielle
43.text: To think like that is to give in to despair, which is exactly what a hag wants - Mayrina taught us that.
43.context: NodeContext: trying to be determined but is really just sad - she cares about mayrina and is worried for her

1.speaker: Adrielle
1.text: Forgive the paranoia - we're being hunted by a vile and wicked hag. We sought refuge here, but -
1.context: NodeContext: worried - she and the group are in a tense situation with their back against a wall (metaphorically)

34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Doll appears standing upright and rigid

8.speaker: Kled
8.context: NodeContext: panicked flailing and pointing at the ground in front of him

53.speaker: Player
53.context: NodeContext: stern warning, trying to tell the group not to let it get away

48.speaker: Adrielle
48.context: NodeContext: stern warning, trying to tell the group not to let it get away

75.speaker: Player
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Doll vanishesNodeContext: cursing - the doll has vanished and they need to find it - immediately

21.speaker: Player
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Doll vanishesNodeContext: cursing - the doll has vanished and they need to find it - immediately

4.speaker: Adrielle
4.text: *Magic infuses every thread - allowing the doll to teleport, curse, and do harm. However, with the right spell, it could be negated.*
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Doll vanishesNodeContext: cursing - the doll has vanished and they need to find it - immediately

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: *Magic infuses every thread - allowing the doll to teleport, curse, and do harm. However, with the right spell, it could be negated.*

10.text: Blast it all. We need to find it, before it hexes us.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Doll vanishesNodeContext: cursing - the doll has vanished and they need to find it - immediately

23.speaker: Adrielle
23.text: Blast it all. We need to find it, before it hexes us.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Doll vanishesNodeContext: cursing - the doll has vanished and they need to find it - immediately

25.speaker: Adrielle
25.text: Spread out! Tear the house apart if you have to!
25.context: NodeContext: a command to the group, gestures to spread out - determined and strong willed

38.text: Wait! I know her. She saved me from Auntie Eh- Eh- Ethel.

74.speaker: Mask of Regret
74.text: Wait! I know them. They saved me from Auntie Eh- Eh- Ethel.

45.text: Lies. I'll cleave you in two and send your corpse to your mistress, scum.
45.context: NodeContext: serious and determined - combat about to start

44.speaker: Player
44.text: We're on the same side - I'm trying to find a way to kill Auntie Ethel.
44.context: NodeContext: confused, holds out a hand to stop the rest of the group from attacking

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Touch me and I'll hurt you more than any bloody hag could.
47.context: NodeContext: confused, holds out a hand to stop the rest of the group from attacking

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Touch me and I'll hurt you more than Auntie Ethel will.
36.context: NodeContext: confused, holds out a hand to stop the rest of the group from attacking

18.speaker: Adrielle
18.text: Wait! No Ethel spawn would speak like that.
18.context: NodeContext: confused, holds out a hand to stop the rest of the group from attacking

92.speaker: Adrielle
92.text: Wait! No Ethel spawn would speak like that.
92.context: NodeContext: confused, holds out a hand to stop the rest of the group from attacking

79.speaker: Adrielle
79.text: Wait! No hag spawn would speak like that.
79.context: NodeContext: confused, holds out a hand to stop the rest of the group from attacking

49.text: We will not bow to your evil terror, beast. Helm guide us!
49.context: NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start

42.speaker: Adrielle
42.text: We will not bow to your evil terror, beast. Helm guide us!
42.context: NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Wait! I'm no hagspawn - I'm a faithful adherent, just like you.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Stay your hand, Sister - I also worship He of the Watchful Eye.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Come, then - I could do with a warm-up.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Calm down! I seek no trouble!
65.context: NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start

76.speaker: Player
76.context: NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start

80.speaker: Player
80.text: What in the hells are you doing?
80.context: NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I WILL EAT YOUR SOULS, RAAAAAH.
51.context: NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start

35.text: I'll send your head back to your mistress, you wretched scum.
35.context: NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start
